text: Albert Bridge may refer to: *Albert Bridge, Brisbane, a railway bridge across the Brisbane River in Brisbane, Australia *Albert Bridge, Nova Scotia, a village and a bridge in Nova Scotia, Canada *Albert Bridge, Datchet, a road bridge in Datchet, Berkshire, England, UK *Albert Bridge, London, a road bridge in London, England, UK *Albert Bridge, Manchester, a road bridge in Greater Manchester, England, UK *Royal Albert Bridge, a railway bridge between Devon and Cornwall, England, UK *Albert Bridge, Belfast, a road bridge in Belfast, Northern Ireland, UK *Albert Bridge, Glasgow, a road bridge in Glasgow, Scotland, UK
title: Albert Bridge
